org.apache.flex.compiler.css

Interface ICSSDocument

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICSSNode, ISourceLocation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CSSDocument

    public interface ICSSDocument
extends ICSSNode
    The root object of a CSS DOM. The CSS3 DOM objects serves not only IDE features in code model, but also CSS compilation.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.apache.flex.compiler.common.ISourceLocation

      • getDefaultNamespaceDefinition

        ICSSNamespaceDefinition getDefaultNamespaceDefinition()
        Get the default ICSSNamespaceDefinition for this CSS document. The default namespace's short name is an empty string "".
